sections.ongoing_summary:
Working on minimap layers bug fix - units not showing, only overhead terrain map visible. Goal to finish before 9:30am UI Devs standup. Multiple standups today: UI Devs + 2 other projects (M/W/F schedule).

Minimap fix took longer than expected - missed 9:30am deadline due to complexity in Web Framework package.

Had good lunch at diner with Erin - AI discussions as usual! Minimap project: pushed working files, remaining issues left for coworkers to handle. Not spending 2 days on what takes them 2 minutes this time.



Minimap bug resolved! Josiah identified it was just a tag on an additional map layer for stationary objects. Working on adding Cloudflare R2 storage as a package option for valet MCP server and other future servers to support multi-machine workflows.
sections.data_stash:
Minimap rotation issue: Josiah and Anthony identified problem is in Web Framework package, buried a couple levels down. Not a surface-level fix.



Friday presentation prep: Brief intro on prompt engineering for Agents (Claude Code showcase)
- 5 literature strategies: Metacognitive prompting, Meta chain of thought, Confidence elicitation & self-consistency checks, Automated skill discovery & exemplar-based reflection, Self-reflection & error prediction prompts
- Will showcase CLAUDE.md and settings.json structure
- Need to review coworker's full optimization list



Claude Code demo ideas for 10-min presentation:
1. Live CLAUDE.md editing - Show how project-specific instructions immediately change Claude's behavior
2. MCP server integration - Quick demo of valet or memory-link servers in action
3. Settings.json customization - Show permission controls and tool configurations
4. Prompt engineering strategies - Live example of confidence elicitation or metacognitive prompting
5. Demonstrate literature strategies while showing technical implementation

5 Literature Strategies to showcase:
1. Metacognitive prompting
2. Meta chain of thought
3. Confidence elicitation and self-consistency checks
4. Automated skill discovery and exemplar-based reflection
5. Self-reflection and error prediction prompts
